title: dAra maga
sahitya:
dAra maga elele gOpi dAra maga oraLaneLeyu tambe kAlanikkuda bahava


caraNam 1    kirujaDe munguruLu araLale mAgAyi surara soliya muddu suridu nalidADuva
    caraNam 2    koraLa huliyuguru shrIgandha tuLasi hAra hIra kaustubha sarava hAkidavaniva
    caraNam 3    karuNAkara varada purandara viTTala vara bhAgavatara kEriyoL nalidADuta bahava
